s: We design legendary Magic: The Gathering playmats that draw inspiration from ancient times and cultures. Our goal is to make your jaws drop when you see them. Check out our About page to learn how we create them.
Paramint is a battleground for creativity, forged by fans, for fans. Here, visionary artists bring their craft to life, earning royalties on every piece they create.

s: After looking through a number of designs, I ultimately went with one of the stitched mats from Paramint Playmats. The colors were very vibrant, the print quality was excellent, and it felt very good to play with. Over a year later, the mat still looks just as lovely and is still good to go ...

t: Amazon.com: Paramint Designs: MTG Artists - Anato Finnstark
s: Anato Finnstark is a professional illustrator and concept artist who has worked with a variety of high-profile clients and organizations, including Wizards of the Coast - the creators of Magic: The Gathering. Her exceptional art has made her a sought-after talent in the industry

I'm Daniel Ziegler and just like you, I love playing Magic. I try to devote as much time as I can to designing jaw-dropping playmats - sometimes it takes a while, but I'm constantly on the move. Stay tuned for new creations soon :) - Daniel
